turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I like to order a few pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three medium pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what are the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first one, I'd like a white pie with anchovies, olives, garlic, mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One serving, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a gluten-free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and the other 2?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A red vegetarian pizza on gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And lastly, for the other one, I'd like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you repeat the third one please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a white pie with mozzarella cheese, clams, and fresh garlic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 3 medium gluten free crust pizzas. the first one is a white pie with achovies, olives, garlic and mushrooms and bacon. the second one is a red vegetarian, the third is a white pie, mozzarella cheese, clams and garlic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total is $38.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy, bye.
